explains: n. 朗姆酒；（一杯）朗姆酒；朗姆芝士；（北美）酒
adj. 古怪的；奇特的；离奇的

sentences.en: He had laced her milk with rum.
sentences.cn: 他在她的牛奶里加了少量朗姆酒。

sentences.en: His favourite tipple was rum and lemon.
sentences.cn: 他最爱喝的饮料是朗姆酒加柠檬汁。

sentences.en: There are Tiramisu, Tutti Frutti, Rum baba and chocolate fondant.
sentences.cn: 有提拉米苏，水果塔，朗姆酒蛋糕和热巧克力蛋糕。
